languages.text: {n}Кровь и не думает останавливаться — в полевых условиях и со средствами, которыми вы располагаете, такое кровотечение не остановить. Остается надеяться, что ткач дойдет до храма прежде, чем испустит дух.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кровь и не думает останавливаться — в полевых условиях и со средствами, которыми вы располагаете, такое кровотечение не остановить. Остается надеяться, что ткач дойдет до храма, и там ему окажут помощь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кровь и не думает останавливаться — в полевых условиях и со средствами, которыми вы располагаете, такое кровотечение не остановить. Остается надеяться, что ткач дойдет до храма прежде, чем испустит дух.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

{n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

{n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No parece que vaya a parar de sangrar: en estas condiciones y con lo que tienes a tu disposición, poco puedes hacer para frenarlo. Solo esperas que el tejedor llegue al templo antes de morir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No parece que vaya a parar de sangrar: en estas condiciones y con lo que tienes a tu disposición, poco puedes hacer para frenarlo. Solo esperas que el tejedor llegue al templo antes de morir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}出血は止まらないようだ。現場の状況や自由に使える手段をもってしても、あなたは出血を止めることはできない。織り手が死ぬ前に神殿にたどり着けることを祈るのみだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}出血は止まらないようだ。現場の状況や自由に使える手段をもってしても、あなたは出血を止めることはできない。織り手が死ぬ前に神殿にたどり着けることを祈るのみだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}流血没有任何停止的迹象。以目前现有的条件，恐怕根本无法止血，你只能希望能在这位教徒咽气之前抵达圣殿。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}流血没有任何停止的迹象。以目前现有的条件，恐怕根本无法止血，你只能希望能在这位教徒咽气之前抵达圣殿。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Blutung scheint nicht nachzulassen ... unter diesen Bedingungen kannst du sie mit deinen Mitteln nicht stoppen. Du kannst nur hoffen, dass der Spinner den Tempel erreicht, ehe er stirbt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Blutung scheint nicht nachzulassen ... unter diesen Bedingungen kannst du sie mit deinen Mitteln nicht stoppen. Du kannst nur hoffen, dass der Spinner den Tempel erreicht, ehe er stirbt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sang coule à flots. Avec le peu de moyens dont vous disposez, vous ne pouvez absolument rien faire pour arrêter l'hémorragie. Vous ne pouvez qu'espérer que le tisseur parvienne à rejoindre le temple avant de rendre l'âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sang coule à flots. Avec le peu de moyens dont vous disposez, vous ne pouvez absolument rien faire pour arrêter l'hémorragie. Vous ne pouvez qu'espérer que le tisseur parvienne à rejoindre le temple avant de rendre l'âme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kanama duracak gibi görünmüyor. Saha koşullarında ve elindeki imkânlar dâhilinde kanamayı engellemek için yapabileceğin hiçbir şey yok. Yalnızca dokurun can vermeden önce tapınağa ulaşabilmesini umuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bleeding shows no signs of stopping — in field conditions and with the means at your disposal, you can do nothing to stem it. You only hope that the spinner reaches the temple before he perishes.{/n}
